title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Jan 21 TU [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Tuesday, 21 January 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Tuesday, January 21 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex talks about the decision to cut Iran out of a Syrian peace conference, the growing possibility of a "humanitarian" invasion of Syria, and suspicious moves by FEMA to purchase bio-medical waste dumpsters in the event of a pandemic.

Alex also takes a look at worrisome developments in China as a $23 trillion credit bubble begins to implode and the banksters warn of a "mega default" in the making.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
